Class Description
App
Entry point for the App
AppTest  
ArgumentsConfig
ValueObject containing configuration for fileSource, fileDestination, threadsCount
ArgumentsParser
Parse CLI arguments and build a ValueObject
ArgumentsValidator
Validates configuration arguments
CliController
A controller handling the business logic - use services, parse, validate, dispatch
Copier
Main class for files copying
CopyFileTask
Copy single file task
ExceptionHandler
Handle exceptions, a basic exception handler
FileWriterHelper
Utility class for writing content into temporary files, used for unit testing
InvalidArgumentsException
Handle exceptions, a basic exception handler
ParallelTasks
Parallelize tasks for files copy
RecursiveFileScanner
Recursively scans source directory for files used in the copy process
